title: report
description: A grouping of asserted related TLOs for purposes of reporting.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `report`

intents.description: Specifies the intended purposes or uses of this report.

intents_ext.description: Specifies alternate intended purposes or uses of this report.

report_contains_refs.description: Specifies the objects that are in this report.

confidence.description: The confidence that the objects contained in this report are related as asserted by the title, description, and intents using the standard confidence vocabulary.

confidence_ext.description: The confidence that the objects contained in this report are related as asserted by the title, description, and intents using a non-standard confidence vocabulary.
